attributes.action: Boris Johnson should resign. The UK needs a snap election. Listen to the people
attributes.additional_details: Boris should resign after 12 months of Covid blunders. Giving PPE contracts to disaster capitalist friends and colleagues of the Tory party. Repeatedly stepping on the backs of the lower class. Making a mockery of health and education workers alike. The UK has lost faith. We need a snap election before it is too late.
attributes.background: Boris to resign and give the UK a snap election.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

You might like to sign the following petition:

Hold an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
